result.execSummary:
The defendant Laura M. Seraphine was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash bail applied to costs, paid in full.
Straight Time. Sentence credit of 25 days were granted. Time Served.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Laura M. Seraphine

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Dated today, from Judge Carter to the Defendant in response to request for sentence credit. Request denied.

ADDRESS INFO for Laura M. Seraphine

Prior: 825 E. North Street #33, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Laura M. Seraphine in court, in custody, with Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count #2.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #2.  Counts #1 & 3 are dismissed and read-in.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Weathers makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #2:  IMPOSED SENTENCE OF:   

25 DAYS STRAIGHT TIME (CREDIT - 25 days)  **TIME SERVED

COSTS:  $243.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation - probation on Case #15CM711)
to appear filed by Attorney Beth Weathers

Attorney M. Elizabeth Weathers in court.   Defendant Laura M. Seraphine did not appear.    District Attorney's Office Law Intern Katrina Seipel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Weathers requests an adjourned date.    Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for September 1, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation, defendant to be seen by the public defender. NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.  Defendant allowed a non-collect call/calls.
